services.virtualServersText: Virtual servers on powerful processors and NVMe SSD drives.
services.dedicatedServersText: Rent of powerful servers in two locations.
services.rentText: Renting nodes/IPs, assistance in opening your hosting service.

benefits.title: Why us?
benefits.descr: We provide next generation hosting provider services. Here are some benefits we can offer.
benefits.freeBackupsText: Your data will be reliably protected thanks to free backup to separate servers
benefits.supportText: Our 24/7 technical support ensures that our customers can always count on assistance at any time.
benefits.ddosText: We are well protected from DDOS attacks, so we continue to work stably even in the face of massive attacks.
benefits.paymentText: You can temporarily rent a server from us for an hour for testing, project demonstration or other purposes.

auth.authRegisterText: Enter your email and we will send you a link to create an account.
auth.authPolicy: By creating an account, you agree to
auth.recoveryText: Enter the email you specified during registration. We will send her an email to reset her password.
auth.recoveryCompleteText: We have sent you a new password to your email.
auth.letterSendText: We have sent an email to {email}, enter the code you received and we will reset your password.

virtual.title: Virtual servers
virtual.text: Possibility of using virtual servers on high-performance AMD processors in combination with NVMe SSD drives
